channel.title: CVE Feed for GhozyLab, Inc. -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-29933|2024-08-08T19:25:12.198Z -- ghozylab%2C%20inc. -- web%20icons
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in GhozyLab, Inc. Web Icons allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Web Icons: from n/a through 1.0.0.10.
